Interface InternshipRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryInternshipRepository
public interface InternshipRepository
repository interface that defines persistence operations for internship records supports CRUD operations, lookup queries, and filtered search

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    delete(String id)
    delete an internship from storage
    List<Internship>
    filter(InternshipFilter filter)
    filter internships based on multiple optional criteria
    List<Internship>
    findAll()
    retrieve all internships stored in repository
    List<Internship>
    findByCompany(String companyName)
    find internships offered by a specific company
    Optional<Internship>
    findById(String id)
    find an internship using its unique identifier
    List<Internship>
    findByStatus(Internship.Status status)
    find internships by approval or availability status
    void
    save(Internship internship)
    save or update an internship record in data storage

  • Method Details

    • findById

      Optional<Internship> findById(String id)
      find an internship using its unique identifier
      Parameters:
      id - internship identifier
      Returns:
      optional containing internship if found, else empty

    • save

      void save(Internship internship)
      save or update an internship record in data storage
      Parameters:
      internship - internship instance to persist

    • delete

      void delete(String id)
      delete an internship from storage
      Parameters:
      id - identifier of internship to remove

    • findAll

      List<Internship> findAll()
      retrieve all internships stored in repository
      Returns:
      list of all internships

    • findByCompany

      List<Internship> findByCompany(String companyName)
      find internships offered by a specific company
      Parameters:
      companyName - company name used for search
      Returns:
      list of internships that match company name

    • findByStatus

      List<Internship> findByStatus(Internship.Status status)
      find internships by approval or availability status
      Parameters:
      status - internship status enum
      Returns:
      list of internships matching given status

    • filter

      List<Internship> filter(InternshipFilter filter)
      filter internships based on multiple optional criteria
      Parameters:
      filter - filter object containing nullable fields defining constraints
      Returns:
      list of internships that meet specified filter conditions
